results.title: Atenolol to treat intestinal ischemia and reperfusion in rats.
results.text_hl: These results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@AT@@@ may attenuate @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@intestinal dysfunction@@@ caused by I and I/R.

citations.NLM: Campos VF, Miranda-Ferreira R, Taha NS, Teixeira GD, Souza WT, Carmo CE, Silva-Neto LA, Gomes IT, Monteiro HP, Montero EF, Fagundes DJ, Caricati-Neto A, Taha MO. Atenolol to treat intestinal ischemia and reperfusion in rats. Transplant Proc. 2012 Oct;44(8):2313-6. PMID: 23026582

results.title: Ischemic preconditioning and atenolol on lung injury after intestinal ischemia and reperfusion in rats.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@Ischemic@@@ preconditioning and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@lung injury@@@ after @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@intestinal ischemia@@@ and reperfusion in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Bonservizi WG, Koike MK, Saurim R, Felix GA, da Silva SM, Montero EF, Taha MO. Ischemic preconditioning and atenolol on lung injury after intestinal ischemia and reperfusion in rats. Transplant Proc. 2014 Jul-Aug;46(6):1862-6. PMID: 25131055

results.title: Acute and Chronic Pretreatment With Atenolol Attenuates Intestinal Ischemia and Reperfusion Injury in Hypercholesterolemic Rats.
results.text_hl: Acute and Chronic Pretreatment With @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ Attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@Intestinal Ischemia@@@ and Reperfusion Injury in @DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@Hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Öztürk T, Vural K, Tuğlu İ, Var A, Kurdal T, Aydemir I. Acute and Chronic Pretreatment With Atenolol Attenuates Intestinal Ischemia and Reperfusion Injury in Hypercholesterolemic Rats. J Cardiothorac Vasc Anesth. 2016 Aug;30(4):985-92. PMID: 27521968

results.title: Intestinal ischemia-reperfusion is attenuated by treatment with atenolol in rabbits.
results.text_hl: These results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@AT@@@ may attenuate @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007410 @@@intestinal dysfunction@@@ caused by I and I/R.

citations.NLM: Taha MO, Miranda-Ferreira R, Simões RS, Oliveira-Júnior IS, Modaelli-Filho ML, Magalhães-Junior WF, Souza ES, Lemos JA, Simões MC, Caricati-Neto A.
